title: Movement of Substances
description: Will the Movement of Substances slides be uploaded on Ivy or over here?

replies.body:
Hey, but how am I going to see it on IVY when I don't have flash and thee programmes might "harm my computer"?
Do I have to sacrifice my computer for some slides?
